document_data.caption: The cover of ''Castle of the Undead''.
document_data.title: Castle of the Undead
document_data.author: [[Nick Baron]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Castle of the Undead''''' is a gamebook in the [[Endless Quest]] series that focused on the [[Ravenloft]] setting. {{Quote|You are trapped!
In the shadow world of Ravenloft, where dark creatures of legend prowl the village streets, Randar, a young adven-turer, seeks the clues to his own mysteriots identity ... a path that has been forgotten in the mists....
With Krug, a telepathic wolf who becomes his friend, Randar mist discover the secret of the Bloodknife, an ancient artilact that holds the key to Randar's past and future.
There in Ravenloft, he must engage in the ultimate battle with the vampire Velkaarn, the evil lord who commands The Castle of the Undead...
ENDLESS QUEST® Books are action-packed stories based on exciting role-playing games that allow you, the reader, to make the decisions that determine the adventure's outcome. Read them over and over to experience new paths of excitement!
ENDLESS QUEST® Books, where you control the adventure!}}
